name: Saint Seiya: Exclamation
summary: Saint Seiya: Exclamation is a Brazilian RPG fangame with characters in the SD (Super Deformed) style. The story continues in an original way with the series, but with the addition of two new characters: Yusei from Vulpecula and Aki from Apus! The new characters were introduced so that the game follows a new line and is not too predictable for the player! When starting the game you can choose between Male (Yusei) and Female (Aki), each of which has exclusive stories in the game!
